name: Another Night (LordNapstablook)
description:
Finding himself in a weird world where physic has different laws, a young man must escape with the help of an unknown voice.

 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

   Another Night is a project made for school over a period of two months.

   We were allowed to make either an original game or to use another game's core mechanic, as such, I wanted to try a mechanic I saw during a game jam coming from the game Outer Bounds.

   All the credit goes to Watermelon and his game (that you should play 'cause it's awesome!) : https://waterlemon0.itch.io/outer-bounds

   But if you find yourself enjoying the game, I guess that's a good thing :D

MUSIC :

Game - Quiet Slumber

Boss - I don't remember and can't find it either
